lead_paragraph: Democrats hoped that by seeking a vote to remove Dean G. Skelos as Senate leader, they would force their Republican colleagues to take a public position on his arrest.

headline.print_headline: Acrimony in Albany as Republicans Stop Effort to Oust Senate Chief
headline.main: Acrimony in Albany as Senate Republicans Stop Effort to Oust Skelos

snippet: Democrats hoped that by seeking a vote to remove Dean G. Skelos as Senate leader, they would force their Republican colleagues to take a public position on his arrest.
abstract: New York State Democrats walk out of State Senate chamber after Republicans block their effort to remove Dean G Skelos as majority leader; had hoped move would force Republicans to take position on Skelos's arrest on federal corruption charges, but were foiled amid squabbles over parliamentary procedures.
